news.title: U.S. consumers are starting to crack as tariffs add to inflation, recession concerns
news.summary: Airline and retail executives are bracing for a slowdown in demand. There are concerns tariffs will cut down consumer spending. The U.S. economy is expected to grow at a slower rate this year.

news.title: Goodbye to 'bags fly free' on Southwest Airlines, the last freebie in America
news.summary: Southwest's customer-focused business model won it a loyal following during its half-century of flying. Southwest's customers have been loyal to the airline for more than 50 years.

news.title: After Elon Musk’s Delaware exit, state lawmakers weigh bill to overhaul corporate law
news.summary: Delaware lawmakers are considering a bill that aims to make the state attractive to investors and executives. The bill aims to improve the state's reputation as a place to do business.

news.title: Intel's new CEO receives $66 million in options and stock grants on top of $1 million salary
news.summary: Lip-Bu Tan will receive $1 million in salary and about $66 million in stocks and grants vesting over the coming years.

news.title: Buy now, pay later lender Klarna files for U.S. IPO
news.summary: Klarna filed its paperwork with the SEC on Friday to go public on the New York Stock Exchange under ticker symbol KLAR.

news.title: They lost their federal jobs and now can’t get jobless benefits: ‘You’re left watching your bank account slowly bleed’
news.summary: Fired federal workers are having trouble getting unemployment benefits. Some experts fear that could spell trouble for the broader economy. The federal government is trying to cut benefits for fired federal workers.

news.title: My husband has dementia and will need care. Will Medicaid go after my money if I use it to pay off our mortgage?
news.summary: “We still have around $300,000 left on our mortgage,” she says. “We’re still in the process of paying it off.”

news.title: Apple now faces a problem far bigger than tariffs or weak iPhone sales
news.summary: A prominent Apple blogger says the company “squandered’ its credibility by advertising Siri features as an iPhone 16 selling point — when they were nowhere near ready to use.

news.title: If I have a Social Security problem, am I out of luck now that staff and services are being cut?
news.summary: Readers have a range of issues — and a lot of trouble getting answers. Readers have a number of issues, and many are not sure how to get to the top.

news.title: The S&P 500 correction shows why risk tolerance matters. These strategies can get investors back on track.
news.summary: The sudden nature of the stock market’s reversal may have made the drawdown feel even worse, especially for retail investors. The drawdown is expected to continue for the next few days.
